<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6351</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Inventors Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre inventores</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist ar Airgeoirí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfinder-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu d'Inventeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Dos Inventores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Degli Inventori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εφευρέτες ρωτούν</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will have a good knowledge of inventions and inventors.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos adquirirán buenos conocimientos sobre los inventos y los inventores.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh eolas maith ag na daltaí ar aireagáin agus aireagóirí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Engineering</string>
            <string language="es">Ingeniería</string>
            <string language="ga">Innealtóireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen haben ein gutes Wissen von Erfindungen 
und von Erfindern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles auront une bonne connaissance des 
inventions et des inventeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas terão um conhecimento bom das 
invenções e dos inventores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille avranno una buona conoscenza delle 
invenzioni e degli inventori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα έχουν μια καλή γνώση των εφευρέσεων και
εφευρετών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ingénierie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Engenharia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ingegneria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6351</entry>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
